textContent:
Predominant religion of Bassadi. Purification, stratification of society, duty to pursue riches and power.

Being generous or freeing slaves is seen as a polluting act.

Rituals of purification. Whenever you do an unpure deed or become soiled by something, you need to purify oneself.
